name: Factions Of Ki - Multiplayer Arena Space Combat
blurb: An epic multi-player arena space shooter for small gang combat.  Currently being built with cutting edge HTML5.  Join the adventure!

rewards.reward: Civil Servant!  Thank your for your contribution!  Your dollar matters!  Share this project with your friends and help us succeed.  Please check out the official page at www.factionsofki.com for updates on the game's progress!
Loyal Citizen!  Get a virtual fist-bump with explosion included!  Thanks for you support.  Check out our facebook page and dev blog to stay connected and share with your friends!

Faction Recruit!  First of the beta tiers.  Limited beta access with 1 ship to fly and test.  On (free to play) release, you will receive a token for a starter ship of your choice.  Your name in the credits as a Carbon Backer.

Faction Recruit II!  Limited beta access with 1 ship to fly and test.  On (free to play) release, you will receive a token for a starter ship of your choice.  Your name in the credits as a Carbon Backer.

Faction Recruit III!  Limited beta access with 1 ship to fly and test.  On (free to play) release, you will receive a token for a starter ship of your choice.  Your name in the credits as a Carbon Backer.

Ensign! Fullscreen beta with 2 different ships to fly and test.  On (free to play) release, you will receive a token for 2 starter ships of your choice.  Your name in the credits as a Titanium Backer.

Ensign II! Fullscreen beta with 2 different ships to fly and test.  On (free to play) release, you will receive a token for 2 starter ships of your choice.  Your name in the credits as a Titanium Backer.

Ensign III! Fullscreen beta with 2 different ships to fly and test.  On (free to play) release, you will receive a token for 2 starter ships of your choice.  Your name in the credits as a Titanium Backer.
Lieutenant!   An additional beta ship and token beyond the Ensign class for 3 ships when official version (free to play) is launched.  Your name in the credits as a Tungsten Backer.

Lieutenant Commander!  Factions Of Ki tee shirt included!  Full Beta tier.  Fullscreen beta with all ships available.  On release, you will receive a token for 5 starter ships of your choice.  Credited as a Carbide Backer.

Commander!  Factions Of Ki tee shirt included!  Full Beta tier. Everything previously listed with special privilege to name content (weapons, ships, stations...etc.) subject to approval!  Credited as a Chromium Backer

Captian!  Factions Of Ki tee shirt included!  All previous items mentioned and a complete unlock of all stater (low level player) content at launch (ships, weapons etc.).  Typical free to play model would require extra game play or purchase of this content.  Credited as a Silver Palladium Backer

Tycoon!  Join Jacob Kizzee (lead developer) on several chat sessions over the development period to help shape the game!  All previous items mentioned and a complete unlock of 25% of available content (low level and up) at launch (available at different player levels throughout the game).  Credited as a Hero Backer

Magnate!  Join Jacob Kizzee (lead developer) on several chat sessions over the development period to help shape the game!  All previous items mentioned and a complete unlock of 50% of available content at launch (available at different player levels throughout the game).  Credited as a Lengedary Backer

Mogul!  Join Jacob Kizzee (lead developer) on several chat sessions over the development period to help shape the game!  All previous items mentioned and a complete unlock of any content created for this game (available at different player levels throughout the game).  Credited as an Epic Backer!
